inn1.comm: moving away, good length, stays calm and pushes to off
straighter now, good length again, pushes hard to mid off
still straighter, right on the stumps this time, he keeps bat close to pad and squeezes it out to point
and there he is at it again, like in the previous game, good length ball moving away neatly past the forward prod, not much bounce
away shape again, this time Nicol is not getting beaten, he lets it go
length ball guided down to third man for a single
lovely inswing into the right hander, pitches full around off, pushed to mid on
moves in from a good length now, just outside off, defended
shaping in once more, but this time the angle was on the pads, and it is sent down behind square leg
curling in again, lots of movement, but moving into the pads sharply, and dribbles away
super, this one holds its line now, angled in slightly, and then kicks and straightens off the seam, beaten completely
Kumar tested with one swinging wildly down leg, manages to stick a glove out
turned neatly with the inward shape off his pads, Thirimanne covers a lot of ground from deep square leg, dives, and saves a run
driven from close to the toe end of the bat to covers
bat in front of pad and runs an away going delivery wide of point
away first ball with a single to third man off a length ball
back of a length for once, he mistimes a forcing stroke from the crease

that's gone low into Jayawardene's hands at second slip, so Nicol got beaten at least ten times on Sunday and made 46, today he edges one early and is gone, fullish length on off, brings him forward, enough away movement to take the edge off the push and fly low to Mahela, they check for the no-ball and the catch, clean on both counts
welcomed with a bouncer, goes down under it
wide and straightish outside off, left alone
comes in now from some way outside off, he leans forward and defends
bounce now from a length, straight and comfortably outside off, he lets it go
thick outside edge along the ground to third man as he drives
length ball, he moves across and outside off to defend down the pitch
came forward, it bounced from a length, he adjusted well to run it to third man
moving away, but pitching slightly back of a good length, and is left alone early
sharp length ball hits the bat hard as he pushes forward, extra cover prevents the single with a short sprint to his right
right on off stump, fuller too, he is in the crease, bat and pad together and defends
single is on this time, drops a climbing length ball in front of extra cover and they are through
back and across to one just outside off and blocks
138 kph from Malinga, good length around off, defended carefully, no chance of  a run

phew, that is too much movement, that has snaked in from a mile outside off, started late too, and then hit him in front of off and middle, they appeal for leg before, but there was too much angle on it
inswing again, dribbles off the pads square to leg
stays in the crease and guides a length ball with an open face, but Dilshan gets in the way at point with a dive
moving in sharply once more, he plays it well, staying back and pushing to mid on
straighter one now, draws him outside off to the line, pushed to cover
good length, lets it go outside off
goes forward, it bounces from a length, he adjusts to drop it in front of mid on
straight on middle stump, good length, turned wide of midwicket
edgy, nervy, pokes at a wide one, it flies past the two slips, but third man stops it with a dive, almost as it reaches the rope
good length, he opens the face, runs it to covers and trots out purposefully, but has to go back
one run taken and five runs scored, pushed to extra cover, throw fired in, hits the running McCullum's bat and races to the deep midwicket rope
pitched up, pushed hard to extra cover
lovely inswing from Kula again, played out to mid on, non-striker has raced out, but gets back in time
pushed down the pitch
outside edge, there is only one slip now, and it flies safely to third man, Kula getting him to drive a pitched up ball
first boundary of the game, in the eighth over, Kula pitching it up, not too much inswing, and he gets behind the line on the front foot to caress it to the right of mid off
similar delivery, he tries to repeat the stroke, doesn't time it this time
wide, he reaches out, and crashes it straight to point, pity
gentle length ball around off, played out quietly
moves across and punches a length ball to mid on
gets across, behind the line and punches back to the bowler
good length, whipped, from outside off, behind square leg
defends a length ball around off
punched from the crease, but short extra cover dives extravagantly to stop it
that kicked off a length, outside off, he takes a hand off the bat and runs it to third man
punched from the crease to extra cover
widish, short of a length, slashed to third man
some width again, but he mistimes a forcing stroke to extra cover
good delivery, good length, moving away outside off, left alone with a flourish
steered straight to point off the back foot
another mistimed push to mid on, length ball not quite coming on, not getting up much too
dropped by the bowler, a full loopy delivery was scooped straight back at Mathews, decent height, and pops out

Mathews gets one next ball, McCullum got too far across looking to work a length ball square to leg, was hit on the edge of the pad, in front of leg stump, and on first glance, looks like the angle could have taken it down leg
beats him first up with one moving away from a good length outside off
this one came in, but after passing the batsman who left it alone

and again, Mathews has put down another catch, pitched up delivery getting an airy drive from Taylor, straight at Mathews and straight out of his hands, oh dear, Mathews has his hand on his face, Mahela grimaces
nudges a length ball off the stumps to midwicket
that was heading for the pad sharply, but Taylor gets the bat around in time to tickle it fine
they are targetting the stumps consistently, another one pitched up, defended back to the bowler
width given this time, and Taylor has a go at the cut to get beaten
leans forward and pushes back down the track
neat, climbs from back of a length and holds its line outside off, he gets bat out of the way
pitched up on the stumps, turned to midwicket
another mistimed push with an angled bat down the ground, mid on races to pick up the ball but is late in throwing it, Watling's dive has him safely in despite the direct hit
that could have been close, it nipped in after pitching on a good length around off, but an inside edge saved the batsman before it crashed into pad
length ball tentatively defended late from the crease
defended off the front foot
pushed down the pitch, but mid off and mid on converge to cut it off
bounce outside off, he runs it to point, almost off the bottom glove
hit him on the pad this time but it was going down leg again, and was high too
rides the bounce and punches off the back foot past point
good length, off stump line, defended solidly back to the bowler
widish delivery crashed away to sweeper cover
tossed up on leg stump and a nudged single to midwicket is on
lovely, hit on the back pad flap with a flighted delivery that pitched middle and spun away, Mahela cannot believe, as usual, that the appeal has been turned down, was missing off with the turn

brilliant stuff from Jeevan, he's raced towards short midwicket, where Taylor had nudged the tossed up delivery, and hit the non-striker's stumps direct, Taylor has not even bothered to wait for the third umpire, he knew he was short
googly again, outside off, he backed away to cut, but it came in a bit and beat him
drives a full delivery down to sweeper cover
stayed low as it spun in to leg, stabbed away
wide outside off and steered to deep point
that was close, it went straight on from round the stumps, Oram was playing for the turn, thick inside edge runs past the stumps to short fine
gets off strike with a single to off
pushed uppishly, but safely past the non-striker to long on
misses the sweep as this one carries full down the leg side
tries to sweep again, this one was floated up slower, hit on the pad
succeeds in sweeping now, it was around off, sends it to deep square

that looked dead straight, Oram tried a reverse sweep to a length delivery, it was the googly, Oram missed and was caught right in front, umpire Dharmasena sends him back, replays show the ball pitched just outside leg stump
pushed down the pitch
legbreak staying low, into the pads, forced in front of square leg
squeezed out down the track
leans out to drive a full delivery to sweeper cover
whipped with the spin to deep midwicket
reaches forward, opens the face, and finds point
tossed up, pushes it past extra cover
punched down to long on
full, drives it down to long off
waits for the legbreak to spin away from a length, and punches to extra cover
slog-swept, saw it flighted and went down on a knee to slam the googly from off over midwicket
leading edge, he went across to work a legbreak to the on side but closed the face early
forced hard to extra cover
cuts a wide legbreak to sweeper cover
flighted on off, quickish, pushed back to the bowler
comes in from round the stumps, punched to covers
quick into the pads, worked away to deep square leg
pushed through full at 96 kph outside off, he is beaten on the drive
flat outside off, cut to deep point
tries to hit out but fails to get much on the full delivery, it dribbles away on the off past the keeper
length ball around off, comes forward to defend to cover
comes down the pitch, finds short midwicket
runs a back  of a length ball to third man
carves a length ball past extra cover and wide of sweeper cover
slower one, only 94 kph, he is beaten as he lunges forward at the line outside off
forced down the track but bowler gets a hand to it
that spun sharply, angled in on middle and leg, and ending on off, he was back in the crease, and got a thick edge to short third
pushes softly to mid off and takes on the throw, which misses

dropped, in fact not attempted at all, in the end, top-edged sweep, Malinga after it from short fine leg, gets close to the ball, and then pulls his hands away, fine leg was far away from Malinga, strange reaction indeed from him
flicked hard but straight to short fine
down the track, makes room and lifts a full delivery down the ground
line is down the pads, and Franklin gets down and gets enough on the paddle to send the ball wide of short fine
down to long on for a single
good length, straight and down the leg side
launches a pitched up delivery in the air, down to long on, didn;t time it
makes room, the length ball is on middle, the cut sends it straight to point
deep midwicket targetted again by Watling, picks a length delivery over the man in the ring, no one in the deep
fine comeback, wide outside off in the blockhole, he cannot connect
makes room, Angelo slows it down, forced to deep point
length ball pushed to midwicket
fine shot, Watling had the width, he got to the line, and placed it well wide of sweeper cover, looked graceful too
ungainly this time as he tries to hoick this one, down to long on
sent down the leg side from a length
Perera appeals loudly but the ball pitched outside, inside edge too
superb timing from Franklin, walks across the stumps and lifts a length ball from middle over square leg, beats the man in the deep
drops a short of a length ball close to the pitch on off
another well-placed drive from Watling, wide of sweeper cover for two
full toss mowed down to long on, would have wanted to time it better
right on middle stump, slow good length delivery, defended carefully
close to the blockhole, and squeezed out to leg
one shot too many for Franklin, charges out, misses the length delivery, which crashes into top of leg
tossed up ball driven to sweeper cover
pushed down to long off
backed away, took it from close to middle stump and sent it to sweeper cover
standing a couple of feet outside leg, and punching one off middle to sweeper cover
defended off the front foot
half tracker, stays low, and the pull does not have enough power to beat deep midwicket's run to his left
turning away outside off, punched to sweeper cover
tossed up full and patted down to wide long on
cannot time the punch as he backs away but the single to extra cover takes him to another half-century, rare and refreshing consistency from an NZ batsman
clipped wide of deep midwicket
KW is gone, skipped out to go down the ground, only went as far as mid on, ball hit the inner part of the bat
starts back of a length, defended onto the pitch
length ball coming into the pads, worked behind square leg
opens the face and runs a shortish delivery to point
whips a length delivery to deep square off the pad
very full, on the stumps, they were fully exposed as batsman was standing outside leg, squeezed out to third man
that is sharp, nearly 140 kph, short and into the body, he was not expecting it, tries to swing it belateedly, it carries on past him
does not quite get hold of the slog sweep, still gets it out to deep midwicket
down for the reverse sweep early, drags it wide of short third man off a bottom edge
full, very wide, and Watling puts it away to the right of sweeper cover, whose effort is in vain
tossed up low full toss, eased wide of long off, they push hard for the second
walks across but leaves alone a wide one
heaves a slog sweep, and we will see more of these strokes fetching boundaries, there is no deep midwicket
straight and quick outside off, chopped square for one
straight and quick outside off, chopped square for one
that is some connection, he's gone back in his crease, swivelled and hooked the bouncer flat over the deep square leg boundary
turns a full slower one to midwicket, whose throw misses
very full again, squeezed out to sweeper cover
goes full for the stumps, Nathan backing away, and finding the bowler as bat closes in his hands
low full toss now, straight to extra cover this time
in the blockhole, 137 kph, dug back to the bowler, top stuff
slow and wide, driven to sweeper cover
low full toss patted down to long off
power and placement, down the track, and carves the length ball hard through point, man in the deep cannot stop it with a dive
another one, walks out again, this one is back of a length, he adjusts to cut it behind point, no chance for sweeper cover at all this time
slow again, he is down the pitch again, but finds sweeper cover now
follows him as he backs away to leg, Watling uses the angle into him to swing to square leg
Watling was gone had the throw from extra cover hit, he had gone too far out, Nathan finding the man as he pushes a yorker out
low full toss, worked square off the pad
Watling is playing a gem, he;s picked up the slow length delivery and mauled it out of long on's reach
full toss, on the pads, Watling deserves some luck now, inside edge flies fine down the leg side, between his pads
outstanding, very low full toss, close to being a yorker, Walting opens up slightly, and carves it past extra cover
he's launching them all around now, scythes a full delivery through midwicket and comes back, needed a better throw to the keeper, he's onto 90 now
down the track, and lofts a slower length delivery over extra cover
full, and there for the taking, but he's flicked it straight to backward square leg
there goes N Mac, full, in the slot, and murdered high down the ground
slower one, 93.5 kph, he has a slog at it, sends it down to long off
he went across eyeing deep square leg, but could not connect with the sweep to a length ball

inn2.comm: nice carry to the keeper from back of a length, started to come back in to the lefthander outside off, left alone
holds its line again, similar length, mistimes a push to the bowler
stays in the crease and runs it down to third man for one
crash! what a start from Dilshan, away swinging delivery outside off, he gets to the line and swats it past extra cover crisply
into the pads now, forced past midwicket
hits the bat sharply from a good length as he defends towards point
straightening around off stump, goes back to block
loose, wafts away from the body as this one moves away to beat him
good length, around off, pushed back to the bowler, 138 kph
pulled, not out of mid on's reach
wide and across him with the angle, beaten on the cut
length ball forced on the up wide of extra cover
pitched up on off stump, pushed to the bowler
short, wide and bashed between cover and point with disdain
pitches it up now, Dilshan defends off the front foot
worked through midwicket's hands, mid on tidies up
good length on middle, pushed to extra cover
appeal for leg before, but that pitched outside leg and also moved back in
similar delivery, only fuller, pushed away tightly
width available this time, and Dilshan cracks it through cover instantly
back of a length, pushed to extra cover this time
moving in to the pads, thick inside edge to square leg
misses out this time, short, wide, done in the by the extra bounce as he tries to cut
he is welcomed by a fine punch off the back foot which sends the length ball through covers
and he responds with a sharp back of a length ball that moves away to beat the outside edge
that was nothing more than a firm push-glide, but his timing is so good that the length ball has raced past cover's dive

Southee has responded well once more, he's pinged Tharanga on the helmet, and the ball has gone screaming over slip, the ball did not get up much and Tharanga ducked right into it, bat was hanging up as well
and he's gone now, what an over, Southee hurrying him again with another short ball, he tries to back away and hook at the same time, the effort lands in fine leg's hands
tries to pull a back of a length ball, mistimed to midwicket
Dilshan continues to hit without a care, length ball slightly outside off, enough for him to send it hard past extra cover
right on middle stump now, good length, defended solidly
punched to extra cover
now Dilshan is hurried by a short ball, head high, he swivels for the hook, and the top edge flies over the keeper
opens the face to steer it to third man
worked with the angle into him to fine leg
bends the knee and goes down under a bouncer
short of a length, blocked off the back foot to the off side
smashes a length ball straight to short cover off the front foot
short and down the leg side
length ball ending outside off, pushed to extra cover
pushes at a length ball, thick edge races past short cover, into the gap
back of a length, widish, but straight to point
moving in to off and middle, pushed to mid on
beats the outside edge with a length ball that holds its line outside off
defends carefully to covers
pitched further up now and he drives, but not wide of point
that has come back in sharply to strike him high on the pad down leg
worked behind square leg
pushes a pitched up ball hard to the bowler
Franklin scrambles to his left and takes pace off a well-timed drive at mid off
slapped past point to sweeper cover
pushes a length ball around off to mid off
Dilshan is in the mood tonight, Oram helps him by serving up a wide length ball, Dilshan winds up and crunches it out of sweeper cover's reach
into the pads and easily tucked through square
full, flicked elegantly off the pads past midwicket
opens the face and runs it to point
full ball pushed hard to the bowler
walks across and works it through square leg
he's just standing and thumping almost everything, finds short extra cover this time
can't beat the man again
mistimes a forcing shot to covers
adjusted well as it came in from a good length and punched it to extra cover
drives to mid off and races across, fielder fails to pick up the ball
on the pads, good length, nudged behind square
can't get the single as he trots out after easing one to point
driven to sweeper cover
crashed straight to sweeper cover, that was hit hard
worked through square leg for a couple
runs a length ball to point
walks down and works to square leg
gets into a tangle as he charges out, the ball does not get up much and he misses to take it on the pads
pushed to a diving short extra cover
can't get any width at the moment, punches a back of a length ball to mid off
slight, only slight width, and Sanga guides it past extra cover
slower one now, guided to point

and like in the previous game, Sanga is gone against the run of play to a sharp catch, he walked out to a short ball and absolutely smacked the pull, Taylor was in the way at midwicket and reacted sharply to take it to his left, they check for the no-ball, it is a tight call, Mills' front foot slid a long way but they reckon he landed some part behind the crease first
softly nudged to midwicket to get going
pitched up, another dot ball, to extra cover
appeal for leg before but that was headed down the leg side
right forward to defend
now Mahela skips out and slices it down to third man
flighted from round the stumps, worked in front of square leg, there is direct hit but he is back for the second
swept hard to a diving short fine, Nicol fires in the throw quickly too
thick outside edge to short third man as this full delivery goes across
pushed wide of mid off
oh dear, Mahela has reverse-swept straight to short third man, big Jacob Oram is standing there, and he leaps to comfortably take it
almost gets into trouble, walks out to a flighted ball and toe-ends it towards slip
flashed, and it is parried away very close to the third man rope with a slide
he has timed them superbly all night, creams a length ball wide of sweeper cover
punched straight to short extra cover
lots of width, but he has punched it to short extra once more
pushes a pitched up delivery to mid on
hops and nudges one behind square leg
worked through square leg with the spin from round the stumps
tries to paddle it fine, but makes no contact as it is fired down leg
nudged behind square leg
turned to deep square leg
punched to a diving midwicket
played out to midwicket
Mathews decides to something about the run rate, charges out and swats a short delivery over mid on
good length, worked to deep square leg off the pad
leans forward and pushes wide of point
cannot time the back-foot punch, ball rolls to mid off
timed well enough this time to go racing to sweeper cover
opens the face and squirts it in front of point
high full toss, the dew would have something to do with that, Dilshan comes out and hammers it over extra cover
flat and quick now into the pads, rolls away to off
slower this time, nudged square to leg
cut away to sweeper cover
quick delivery pushed to long on past the bowler's dive
punched to midwicket
skips out and misses as he looks to loft down the ground
nearly squared up this time, ball rolls away to extra cover
swats a length ball in front of mid off
short and wide, clobbered wide of sweeper cover, another fifty for Dilshan
hit high on the pad as he misses the work to leg
runs a length ball to point
and the dry ball grips the surface and Dilshan pushes uppishly down the track
gets away again, charges out to a tossed up ball which spins in, inside edge saves Dilshan
much more help with the changed ball for the spinner, pushed towards extra cover off a leading edge
this one goes across with the angle and beats the outside edge
stayed low this one, as it jagged across outside off
forced away to deep square leg, free hit coming up
low full toss, almost in the blockhole, squeezed out to long on
sharp stop at short cover, Nathan McCullum dives and saves what could have been a boundary, it was struck crisply
a chance, but very difficult, pitched up delivery slammed back at Boult, he decides to duck under the missile
Dilshan carves a length ball to the left of mid off
cannot get the single with a push to off close to the pitch
worked to deep square leg
makes room and punches it off the stumps wide of sweeper cover
steered, stopped at short third man with a dive
quick, cramping him, nudged to leg
backs away to force it to long on
that has beaten Mills' dive at mid off and is a welcome four for Sri Lanka, Mathews skipped out and flashed hard at a full delivery
hit down to long on
short, he drags a pull to deep midwicket
width, lots of it, and Mathews punishes it for four past backward point
slower one tucked square on the leg side
steered behind point for one
more width, Mills is furious with himself, Mathews is helping himself to another boundary to deep point
whipped off the pads behind square leg
tries to play the scoop again, but again fails to connect with the length ball
Mathews capitalises on a wide and full one, charges out, reaches to the line and lifts it over extra cover
whipped to deep midwicket
tickled to short fine leg off the pad
squeezed out to short third man
Angelo is in pain, the throw from point has hit him flush on the right glove
plays out a back of a length ball to leg
slow length ball pushed down the pitch
lucky for Angelo, tried to pull a not so short one, hit high on the blade, and falls around vacant mid off
drives a pitched up ball to mid off
slower and slanted down the leg side, bounces in front of Watling and gives him trouble
he is successful third time with the scoop, picks up the length ball from outside off and sends it past short fine
charges out, swings and misses
poor line, angled into the pads, and a tickle is all that is needed to beat the keeper
fired full into the pads, flicked to deep square
line gone wrong again, full and down the leg side
hit on the pad as he misses the work to leg

dropped, that could be New Zealand's final chance, tough chance, Dilshan gave a slow short ball everything, sliced it high, Nicol at backward point put in a leap to get his hands to it, but could not hold on
caught behind appeal turned down now, Southee following Angelo down the leg side with a length ball, and Watling takes it tumbling down and immediately appeals, replays show it came off the pad
driven straight to extra cover
charges out, Oram bowls it slow, Dilshan bashes it down the pitch close past the bowler, mid off gets to ot
controls the stroke as he helps a short ball to fine leg
nudged to fine leg off the pad
driven to sweeper cover
slapped away to sweeper cover
length ball hit to sweeper cover
full, flicked wristily off the pads to deep square
backs away and pushes it from leg stump towards cover
sharp, back of a length, forced wide of cover
turned through square leg, two more taken comfortably
first ball of the Powerplay, back of a length, is thumped to the deep midwicket rope to bring up the 100 of what has been a match winning partnership
tries to launch it over square leg, misses, hit on the pad
backs away and opens the face to run it to point
length ball whipped to deep square leg
short of a length and coming in, pulled hard to deep square leg
inside edge helps Dilshan to another boundary and takes him into the 90s, charged out and had a go at a pitched up ball
worked away to deep square leg, and that is Angelo's fifty to loud cheers all round
makes room and hits a length ball to mid on, Taylor has a go at the striker's stumps, misses
full delivery has been lifted with an open face over covers for another four
mishit on the bounce to mid on

Dilshan leaves nothing to chance as he reaches his century with a six over deep square leg, heaves a short of a length ball over the rope, emphatic celebration, he was battling a sore back before the start of today's game
slashed wide of sweeper cover for a couple more, lovely timing once again, as he has been doing all night
Angelo finishes it with a confident cut through point and Sri Lanka now cannot lose the series
